name: Byters
description:
Battle your Byters by spelling out words to damage your opponent! 

         Features

         *Over 260,000 + words in game dictionary

           that's 3.2mbs !

         *100 different creatures ! 

         *Have  up to a party of six creatures !  

         *5 different locations with 5 boss battles!

         *Wholesome and meaningful story!

         *Very educational for kids, and adults!

         *Keyboard compatable for Android and PC

         *Play using touch screen, mouse, or even keyboard ! 

Game is for Android.

Game can be emulated on a PC, keyboard compatible with both phone and computer.

Video of game play on Odysee aswell

https://odysee.com/@Succeeding_lights_software:0/Byters:9
